headless.start_instance: cd modules/compute/docker; ssh-add -L > instance_key; sudo docker images | grep raptiformica-baseimage || sudo docker build -t raptiformica-baseimage .; sudo docker run --privileged -d raptiformica-baseimage > container_id && sleep 10
headless.detect_stale_instance: bash -c 'cd modules/compute/docker && [ -f container_id ] && sudo docker ps --no-trunc | grep -f container_id'
headless.clean_up_instance_command: bash -c 'cd modules/compute/docker; [ -f container_id ] && (cat container_id | xargs sudo docker kill -9 || /bin/true; cat container_id | xargs sudo docker rm -f || /bin/true)'
